title: Seventh Annual St Bride conference: Update
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907043359/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 21.Apr.2008 3.41pm 

Seeking Inspiration: creative thinking around the design process  
================================================================  
Seventh annual St Bride Library conference  
15-16 May 2008  
At St Bride Library, Bride Lane, Fleet St, London EC4Y 8EE

The full price for tickets is £100 rather than £150; Friends can get  
full-price tickets for £90.

The full list of speakers is: Paul Antonio, Joel Armstrong, Antonije  
Baturan, Sara De Bondt, Susanna Edwards, Katherine Gillieson, William  
Hall, George Hardie, Rian Hughes, Robin Kinross, Emily Luce, Karel  
Martens, Tyler Moorehead, Lizzie Ridout, Erik Spiekermann, Jeremy  
Tankard, Jake Tilson.

For more information, and to book online:  
 [http://seekinginspiration2008.stbride.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907043359/http:/seekinginspiration2008.stbride.org/ "http://seekinginspiration2008.stbride.org/")

. . . . . . . .

Stay up to date with our events feed  
 [http://stbride.org/events\_education/events.rss](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907043359/http:/stbride.org/events_education/events.rss "http://stbride.org/events\_education/events.rss")
author: Miss Tiffany
